description.en:
INLOCK is a blockchain-based lending platform that enables customers to use their cryptocurrencies as collateral for a stablecoin loan.

Unique features include:
High interest rate Savings Account
In-platform swap function, exchange your crypto without transferring it from your savings account
Use Binance Smart Chain to avoid ETH fees when transferring your funds
Tiered Bonus rewards for holding ILK tokens
Borrow on exceptional LTV values ~60%
Pioneer program referral rewards
